# ADR-004: Integrate Firestore Real-time Reporting in CI Pipeline

**Status:** Accepted
**Date:** 2026-01-30
**Source:** init (auto-generated from git history)

## Context
Development teams needed visibility into AI agent progress and CI pipeline status in real-time for better monitoring and debugging.

## Decision
Integrated Firestore-based real-time reporting system into the CI pipeline to track agent progress and pipeline status.

## Rationale
Real-time visibility into automated processes enables faster debugging and better operational awareness of system health.

## Alternatives Considered
Traditional CI logs or external monitoring solutions could have provided visibility.

## Consequences
- **Positive:** Enhanced observability and debugging capabilities for automated development processes.
- **Negative:** Additional Firebase dependency and potential costs for real-time database operations in CI environment.
